name: Agrajag's Manor
description:
Agrajag's Manor OR Christopher Lloyd's grandfather's manor is being over run by zombies!

Fight back the zombie horde for as long as you can! And after you're dead, possess the furniture so you can keep fighting!

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to attack
  • Defeat zombies to unlock furniture to possess
  • Defend your furniture from the zombies. You can't possess destroyed furniture!

This game was made by Mike and Dan for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 :)

Find the source code in Dan's GitHub!

https://github.com/DanCurrie15/AgrajagsManor
